info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: The story for BOYSEN®® Color Trend 2020/21 is Vision 20/20. It is about clarity and alignment of self, purpose, and intention. This crucial time asks us to cleave through chaos with virtue, starting with those tiny, incremental, even seemingly insignificant steps that we take each day for every choice we make. ORIGINS, NOSTALGIA, KINSHIP, and META
